siteMetadata.title: Drew McMillan - Software Engineer
siteMetadata.description: Personal website of Drew McMillan, a software engineer in London, UK. Drew is currently working at BBC News on a brand new React/Node stack and has a strong interest in all things frontend web.

node.html:
I am a Software Engineer currently working at BBC News, after spending time across PHP, Ruby and React microservices. I now focus primarily on the isomorphic React application Simorgh.

I’m a keen developer, always looking to learn about new technologies and how it improve both the development and user experience. Feel free to take a look at my CV, I’m always interested in hearing about new opportunities.
